sections.MISSION:
TAC executes Situational Exercise IVO PA 153 from 17-19 OCT IOT train SMs on SOPs and Tactics
TAC STX 01 AUG 23
5.
sections.CMD AND SIGNAL:
Signal
Primary: Troop CMD Net: FH 600
Alternate: Cell Phone
Contingency: Cell Phone
Emergency: Runner
OIC: 1LT Harris, Kyle +49 152 54768766
RSO: SSG Zagal, Gilbert +49 152 29895294 Medic:
sections.PURPOSE: – Ensure TAC platoon SMs are proficient in new TAC setup, comms integration/troubleshooting and Infantry tactics in preparation for Saber Junction ’23.
sections.KEY TASKS: Conduct ITN Radio classes on 10 Level
sections.TASKS:
Conduct Battle Drill 1 Day/Night
Conduct Battle Drill 9 Day/Night
Rehearse TAC & Battle Tracking Operations
3.
sections.EXECUTION:
All will draw weapons systems at troop
SMs will link-up at the Troop
SMs will SP to PA 153
SMs will establish the TAC IVO 32U QA 10458 06995
SMs will conduct comms checks with HQ
SMs will conduct BD 1 and BD 2 during the day and at night (under NVGs)
SMs will conduct EIB and CBRN during downtime (Twilight)
Personnel: TAC Platoon & HQ
4.
sections.SUSTAINMENT:
Class I – M/M/M
Class III – SP full tanks and fuel cans
Class IV – TBD
Class VIII – CLS bag / PLT
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
–
HQ: 1x personnel with MUOS radio for comms checks
Uniform: Dragoon Standard
Equipment Needed: Whiteboard, Markers, 162, 163s, 1523-E, SKL, WINTAK & ATAKs
